name: Losing Control
description:
Made for #selfcarejam

New update with last (hopefully) bug fixes online! Thank you for your patience :)

Losing Control is a game about the importance of negative emotions.
I wanted to create this game as a reminder to myself that feeling bad isn't necessarily a bad thing, that those feelings have importance and that they aren't permanent.

Point & click to move and interact

A game created by @lisajanssens with programming help by Stef Colruyt and others.
Sound courtesy of my noisy laptop fan and me blowing into a mic, with some mixing help by @koenaad.
